title: Replace logo with clothing brand appropriate image

requirements.summary: Replace the current logo image with a new clothing brand appropriate logo that better represents Bho Creation as a clothing manufacturing company
acceptanceCriteria: New logo image is displayed in the site header corner next to 'Bho Creation' text
Logo visually represents a clothing/fashion brand aesthetic
Logo maintains proper sizing and alignment with the company name
Logo is stored as a static asset in frontend/public/assets/generated/

file_operations.description: Add the generated clothing brand logo image to the static assets directory. This logo features fashion/garment industry elements and will replace the existing 101843004_247003263392167_3873501175990976512_n.jpg file.

requirements.summary: Update the Layout component to reference the new clothing brand logo image file
acceptanceCriteria: Layout component imports and displays the new logo image
Image path correctly references frontend/public/assets/generated/ directory
Logo renders properly in both mobile and desktop views

file_operations.description: Update the logo image reference from 101843004_247003263392167_3873501175990976512_n.jpg to the new generated logo at frontend/public/assets/generated/bho-creation-logo.dim_200x200.png. Ensure the image path is correctly referenced in the img tag and maintains proper sizing and alignment with the 'Bho Creation' company name text in both mobile and desktop layouts.
